block.p: U.S. Will Work With Fujimori Despite criticism of Peru's election, the Clinton administration says it does not have the leverage to force a new vote and will work with President Alberto K. Fujimori.
PAGE 4
Girding for Convention The Democratic National Convention is shaping up as the biggest test in years for Los Angeles, as protesters train for action and city officials feud over financing.

Okinawa's Forgotten A former Air Force lawyer has taken up the cause of Japanese women on Okinawa left with the children of American servicemen.
